name: Cult 2112
description:
Cult 2112 is a game about an unknown hero that he decided to defy the forces of a mysterious sect, which is located underground. Explore the mysterious structure and scour all who stand in your way. The game has 15 levels, the final boss, 4 types of weapons.

Cult 2112 is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clean all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final game.


Game features:
-Pixel graphics
-System hero weapon upgrades
- Final Boss
-After killing the final boss, a new game mode opens.
